text: Va afrode az onon [musrikon] hastand, ki [hangomi tilovati Qur'on] ʙa tu gus mesuporand va [-le] mo ʙar dilhojason parda afkandaem, to onro nafahmand va dar gushojason sangini [qaror dodaem] va agar tamomi mu'cizot [va daloili tavhid]-ro ʙuʙinand, [ʙoz ham] ʙa on imon nameovarand, to nazdat ʙijojand va ʙo tu mucodala kunand. Kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, megujand: «In [Qur'on, cize] Nest magar afsonahoi pesinijon»
